transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Last week, on a very special "Space Ghost Coast to Coast":

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Get me 100 cc's of bolgerdrine, stat! Clear!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: The clock is ticking, Mr. President. You must make a choice!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (as the President) A stolen treasure map?

transcript.speaker: (Special opening titles and theme, a la "Charlie's Angels", with Zorak, Moltar and Space Ghost in the title screen, with subtitles
transcript.dialogue: "Space Ghost Coast to Coast / © MCMLXXIII Martin Quin")

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost Coast to Coast, a Martin Quin Production. With Space Ghost (Space Ghost), Zorak (Zorak), koochie-koochie girl Charo (Black Widow), Moltar (Moltar), Tansit (Tansit), Metallus (Metallus)

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Adrienne Barbeau (handy man), and special guest stars Metallica (Metallica).

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (over dramatic music) Tonight's episode, "Hickory Dickory Dead". (screen subtitles: "Hickory Dickory Dead / Act I")

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I can take it from here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nope. Got something better. Tansit! Y'okay in there, buddy? Think we're about to start in a minute.

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: (click!) Hello? (tap tap tap) Is this on? (click!)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, Tansit, I can hear you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, it's, it's not broken, just keep the button pushed in.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, just keep the button pushed in!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, no, the other button, the other one. The other one!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's the button, it's right in front of ya!

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever, screen returns to normal) Okay, I think I got it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Good. You're clear on how the feeds work, right?

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: 10-4 on that, Space Ghost. Over and out!

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: Who? I-i-is, is it that time?

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever) Uh, no... (throws another lever) let's see, uh... (throws another lever) Yeah, right...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please welcome heavy music makers, Metallica.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in quiet voice) Okay, all right. Tansit...

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: I can do that better. (throws another lever, screen shows a different test pattern)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, y'know, folks, I ran into Metallica just last year at a celebrity Pro Am down in Myrtle, Myrtle Beach last year. Myrtle Beach, right, Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Metallica! (another test pattern on the screen)

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: I, I, I thought I got it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tansit, what the heck's going on in there, buddy?

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: (finally gets picture of Metallus) Guest coming up! Fresh off the griddle (throws lever)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (under his breath) Well, it's about time.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, it's not right. It's wrong. Very wrong.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I think we have a problem.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen, Zorak, can you operate the feeds?

transcript.speaker: (Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
(Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
James Hetfield
transcript.dialogue: (on control room monitor) [Burp!] Sorry, I just had, like, a tuna sandwich, uh, slimy eggs in it.

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I could tell, would you like a mint?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to control room) Tansit, what are you doing? Is Metallica here?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, biggie! You screwed up the fe-... wait a minute. Who's this?

transcript.speaker: Kirk Hammett
transcript.dialogue: (points to Jim) That's the mighty Hetfield. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: We were just having a lovely conversation about tuna...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, that's nice. Now, would you give me the right guests so I can do my job. You know, talk show host?

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: Oh, sorry. (throws lever, sends Metallica to monitor on set)

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: You think you're so hot. I can twist you and punch you and hurt you so badly, I can...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos back in) I heard that! (invisos out)

transcript.speaker: Kirk Hammett
transcript.dialogue: I, I tell you why you're so...

transcript.speaker: James Hetfield
transcript.dialogue: Look at the pics, look at Space Ghost, man, when you talk.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, looky there, Zorak, it's Metallica!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Howdy, Metallica. Did Tansit treat you in a pleasant, courteous and professional manner?

transcript.speaker: James Hetfield
transcript.dialogue: He had an annoying little voice. I wanted to smash him, with my boots. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, uh, we're, we're in a transitional state...

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, clean up on aisle eight. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: This intercom thing is a pip!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Would you excuse me for a moment?

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: (still laughing) Aaah! You're squeezing my arm!

transcript.speaker: (Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
Brak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, I think I'm pregnant!

transcript.speaker: (Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) That's pretty keen! You guys are quite the musicians!

transcript.speaker: James Hetfield
transcript.dialogue: We're big fans of, uh, the musical part of your show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You like the Zorak, do you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, what do you know? Hey, Zorak, did you hear that, buddy?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Looks like you've got some fans.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I bet you think you're evil now!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Really! Well, aren't we the pretty ones!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well boys, I'm going to give you a break. I'm going to let you play a song for Zorak! Ladies and gentlemen, Metallica!

transcript.speaker: James Hetfield
transcript.dialogue: (singing) Space Ghost, you're like the dude...You oughta like hang out and be in our band...You're like the man...And, uh, you are, 'cause you kick a lot of buttock...(big finish)Cool!

transcript.speaker: (Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
(Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
Kirk Hammett
transcript.dialogue: Hey, could, (laughs) hey, could we smoke a cigar, or is it gonna mess with the oxygen in here?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And just where pray tell did you get those grubby things? Did Tansit give them to you?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did you give the boys cigars?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And why did you do that?

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: Well, my daddy always said, "There's nothing like a good stogie to clean the pipes." Y'know?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, I don't know. Here I am, on this anti-smoking campaign, doing telethons, dressing as a clown and visiting children's hospitals, donating time and money out of my own tights, and then here you come, (doing Tansit imitation) "Here, fellas, smoke up!"

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: But... but I was just being hospitable.

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: St-st-stay away from me! I'm a villain!

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tell me where Moltar went, and I won't!

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: But I can't! Zorak told me not to tell.

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: He, he said he would get his swarm of angry henchmen...

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: He said he was going to...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak doesn't have a swarm of henchmen.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You give me no choice, Tansit. I'm going to count to three.

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: (crying) Okay, okay! Moltar's on a bus!

transcript.speaker: Tansit
transcript.dialogue: To Jacksonville! That's all I know! (sobbing) Just, just don't hurt me! Don't hurt me! (sobs louder)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, take over the show. Don't escape, okay?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've got some heat to seek.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, uh, you know what I'm talkin' about. (flies off)

transcript.speaker: (Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, it has come to my attention that I am pregnant!

transcript.speaker: (Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
(Title graphic and dramatic theme music; subtitle
Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (singing) "Everybody's talkin' at me, I don't hear a word they're sayin', just..."

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in next to Moltar) Going somewhere, little Timmy?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It was the perfect plan, wasn't it?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Look, if you're trying to wear me down, so I'll confess something I didn't do, I won't do it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hey listen, the truth is, I know nothing about the plane crash, or the whereabouts of Umberto Malzone!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You think he's gonna protect you? You fool. You're useless to him now! Men like him don't hang, Moltar! Men like him watch their own neck.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't feel like kidding today, Moltar. I need to know. Are you going to leave me? (dramatic sting music)

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (Moltar still) After the Jacksonville incident, Moltar was returned to his post as director of the show, given a spanking, and told never to escape again. (Tansit still) Tansit was also swatted lightly across the fanny for his role in the Metallica debacle. (Space Ghost still) Space Ghost resumed his duties as host of the popular animated talk show, and was later to be spotted that very evening with gal pal Tori Spelling. (Passenger 12 still) Upon Space Ghost's arrival, Passenger 12 choked on a 'Cracklin Tatah'. Witnesses quoted him as saying, "Man, there's a 'Cracklin Tatah' choked in ma throat." (Zorak still) Zorak eventually led Metallica to the outer air lock, where members of the band were heard to say, "Shouldn't we put on a suit or something?" (Metallica still) Metallica exploded in deep space. (Metallus still) Mwam mwam mwam, mwam mwam mwam...

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: The story you have just heard is true. The names have been changed to protect the innocent. Speaking of names, I have a kitty named Fluffy. Sometimes Fluffy scratches the sofa, and I say, "Down, Fluffy, down, or Fluffy get no din-din." Sometimes Fluffy urp in the corner. Fluffy knows better than that. Cats are fun. I like them.
